alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 26 at 3:00PM MST until January 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PST /NOON MST/ TO 7 PM PST /8 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 11 AM PST /noon MST/ to 7 PM PST /8 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
